title: Saying Salam when entering Graveyard or Cemetery
transcript: so forth from indonesia he says what's the ruling on giving salaam to the people in a cemetery this is an authentic sunnah whenever the prophet assad used to enter a cemetery he was he used to say so such thicker is part of the sunnah without any problem so whenever you pass by a cemetery of muslims you should make dua for them you should give salam to them and this fills their graves insha allah with light
